title: The Passion of Marie Romanov
description: The Passion of Marie Romanov, a #1 bestseller on Amazon e-books, is a new and intimate telling of the Romanov tragedy from the point of view of Anastasia's closest sister, Marie. Marie and Anastasia were two years apart- Marie being the elder of "The Little Pair". They shared a bedroom, confidences, secrets and a great sisterly love. Marie tries to protect Anastasia as the Russian Revolution overtakes the family.Based on primary sources such as diaries and memoirs by the servants, friends, ladies-in-waiting and tutors who knew the family well.
author: Laura  Rose
